pullrequest.title: Bugfix for pulseblaster fixed shot duration workaround.

content.raw:
Found this one in the depths of my fork from  a year ago. If my memory serves me correctly, I implemented this fix in the relevant lab and it has been in use there.

I assume the commit message had an error and that I meant to write "Sometimes check_status would run in between transition_to_**buffered** and start_run".
content.html:
Found this one in the depths of my fork from a year ago. If my memory serves me correctly, I implemented this fix in the relevant lab and it has been in use there.

I assume the commit message had an error and that I meant to write "Sometimes check_status would run in between transition_to_buffered and start_run".
